name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir fry in a pan with soy sauce.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Boil pasta, sauté vegetables in olive oil, mix.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa, chop vegetables, mix with lemon juice and parsley.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon juice, spread on bread, season with salt and pepper.

name: Berry Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables, crumble feta, mix with olive oil and oregano.

name: Oatmeal Bowl
instructions: Cook oats in milk, top with sliced banana, honey, and nuts.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Sauté onion, add tomato, chickpeas, coconut milk, and curry powder, simmer until thickened.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill chicken, chop vegetables, toss together with olive oil.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Hollow bell peppers, stuff with cooked quinoa, black beans, and tomato, bake with cheese on top.

name: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with lemon, garlic, dill, and olive oil, bake until cooked.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Cut sweet potato into wedges, toss with olive oil and paprika, bake until crispy.

name: Mango Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and honey, let sit overnight, top with mango.

name: Spinach Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs, sauté spinach and onion, pour eggs over, add cheese, cook until set.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Cook lentils with chopped vegetables in vegetable broth until tender.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic, add tomatoes and vegetable broth, and simmer with basil.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with sautéed vegetables and olive oil.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in a pan with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa, mix with diced vegetables, feta cheese, olive oil, and lemon juice.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Cook onions, garlic, and ginger, then add chickpeas, coconut milk, and curry powder. Simmer.

name: Sweet Potato Mash
instructions: Boil sweet potatoes, mash with butter, salt, and pepper.

name: Cucumber Sandwich
instructions: Spread cream cheese on bread, top with cucumber slices, and garnish with dill.

name: Vegetable Tacos
instructions: Fill taco shells with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, avocado, and lettuce.

name: Spinach and Ricotta Stuffed Shells
instructions: Stuff pasta shells with spinach and ricotta, top with tomato sauce, and bake.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice and spread on toasted bread. Sprinkle with chili flakes.

name: Lentil Salad
instructions: Mix cooked lentils with diced veggies, feta cheese, olive oil, and lemon juice.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables, add broth, tomatoes, and pasta, and simmer until pasta is cooked.

name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Grate zucchini, mix with other ingredients, form patties, and fry.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Combine chopped veggies, feta, and olive oil, and sprinkle with oregano.

name: Hummus
instructions: Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil until smooth.

name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
instructions: Cook oats with milk, add diced apple, cinnamon, and honey.

name: Cauliflower Rice
instructions: Grate cauliflower, sauté with garlic in olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.

name: Veggie Burger
instructions: Mash black beans, mix with grated veggies and breadcrumbs, form patties, and fry. Serve on buns.

name: Mango Smoothie
instructions: Blend mango, banana, yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Stuff bell peppers with cooked quinoa, tomatoes, and onions, top with cheese, and bake.

name: Tomato Basil Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with sautéed tomatoes, garlic, and olive oil, and garnish with fresh basil.

name: Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds with almond milk, honey, and vanilla, and refrigerate overnight.

name: Garlic Bread
instructions: Spread butter and garlic on bread, bake until golden, and sprinkle with parsley.

name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix grated carrots with dry ingredients, bake, and top with cream cheese frosting.

name: Cabbage Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry cabbage with onion, garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.

name: Potato Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes, mix with mayonnaise, mustard, onions, and pickles.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices, layer with tomato sauce and cheese, then bake.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms, then add rice and broth, and cook until creamy. Top with parmesan.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, peanut butter, milk, honey, and ice until smooth.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables, add rice and soy sauce, and mix in scrambled egg.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with tomato sauce, top with cheese, and bake.

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
instructions: Mix spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, and garlic, bake, and serve with crackers.

name: Berry Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass, drizzle with honey.

name: Baked Sweet Potatoes
instructions: Drizzle sweet potatoes with olive oil, season, and bake until tender.

name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with chopped vegetables, olive oil, and lemon juice.

name: Baked Apples
instructions: Core apples, fill with cinnamon and honey, and bake with butter.

name: Cauliflower Pizza Crust
instructions: Grate cauliflower, mix with cheese, egg, and garlic, bake until crispy.

name: Tomato and Cucumber Salad
instructions: Mix sliced tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions, and drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
